sense.def:
A nest
je prostor, ki si ga pripravijo ptice, žuželke in druge živali, da v njem izvalijo jajca ali povržejo mladiče.

seg.quote: We had a wasp's nest in the roof.

sense.def:
Kadar ptica
nests somewhere
, si nekje naredi gnezdo in izvali jajca.

seg.quote: Hornbills nest in holes in trees.
